Row.Text: [COLOR_MAGENTA]* National Guild (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Artist. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Artist acquisition (2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).

[COLOR_MAGENTA]* National Guild (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Artist. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Artist acquisition (2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).

[COLOR_MAGENTA]* National Guild (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Artist. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Artist acquisition (2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).

[COLOR_MAGENTA]* National Guild (each player may build one)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points (GPP) towards a Great Artist. Add up to two specialists to this building to gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and increase the rate of Great Artist acquisition (2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] GPP per specialist).

The Artists' Guild is a building that contains artist specialist slots, which are critical for generating Great Artists. If your goal is a cultural victory, this building is a must-have. The Artists' Guild provides 2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points, and each assigned specialist provides 3 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Points and 2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
